kannada_original: ಈ ದೇಹ ಕಪ್ಪೆಂದು ಚಿಂತೆ ಏತಕೆ ಬರಿದೆ?
english_transliteration: Ī dēha kappendu cinte ētake baride?
english_translation: Why worry pointlessly that this body is dark?
If the mind does not become bitter, that is life's comfort!

kannada_original: ಮರೆ ಜನರ ತನುಬಣ್ಣ; ಹಿರಿದು ಮನುಜರ ಕೊಡುಗೆ!
english_transliteration: Mare janara tanubaṇṇa; hiridu manujara koḍuge!
english_translation: Forget the body color of people; the contribution of humans is great!
Quality/virtue is the true musk! – Muddu Rama.
